subject: Super Bowl
Football
lead_paragraph: When I was growing up in Indianapolis in the 1960s, the Colts were unloved and in Baltimore, but the Bears were 180 miles and a flick of the TV dial away.
snippet: When I was growing up in Indianapolis in the 1960s, the Colts were unloved and in Baltimore, but the Bears were 180 miles and a flick of the TV dial away.
